## FixedProductTax interface

A single FPT that can be applied to a product price.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FixedProductTax 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [amount?](./magento-api.fixedproducttax.amount.md) | Maybe&lt;[Money](./magento-api.money.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Amount of the FPT as a money object. |
|  [label?](./magento-api.fixedproducttax.label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The label assigned to the FPT to be displayed on the frontend. |
